name: Digital Janitors DEMO
description:
Fill out our survey here after playing~

Digital Janitors is a desktop defense game set in an exaggerated caricature of the nineties. You play as an IT Administrator for Merter Corporation who must fight back a vicious virus from taking over your employer's network. 

  • Satirical pop-up advertisements!
  • Intense file sorting action!
  • Personal computing mayhem!

Follow Tired Turtle Games on Twitter!
